evidence.text: As of the date of this order, March 1, 2025, through the expiration of plaintiff’s five-year term as Special Counsel, defendants Bessent, Gor, Gorman, Kammann, and Vought must recognize plaintiff’s title and position...

extracted.value: through the expiration of plaintiff’s five-year term: Order (001)

evidence.text: defendants Bessent, Gor, Gorman, Kammann, and Vought must recognize plaintiff’s title and position as Special Counsel of the Office of Special Counsel

extracted.value: Recognize plaintiff’s title and position as Special Counsel of the Office of Special Counsel

evidence.text: they must not obstruct or interfere with his performance of his duties

extracted.value: Not obstruct or interfere with plaintiff’s performance of duties

evidence.text: they must not deny him the authority, benefits, or resources of his office

extracted.value: Not deny plaintiff authority, benefits, or resources of his office

evidence.text: they must not recognize any Acting Special Counsel in his place

extracted.value: Not recognize any Acting Special Counsel in plaintiff’s place

evidence.text: they must not treat him in any way as if he has been removed, or recognize any other person as Special Counsel or as the head of the Office of Special Counsel

extracted.value: Not treat plaintiff as removed or recognize any other person as Special Counsel
